testimonials.text: Rakshith is extremely knowledgeable in full-stack development. I have had the pleasure of collaborating with him on a very high-profile project where he was the gatekeeper of code. He had an answer for any question we asked and at the same time showed humility, patience and kindness towards junior developers. I hope I get the chance to work with Rakshith again. I know that the code would be clean, functional and modern.

I worked with Rakshit for multiple engagements and he is extremely strong in angular react and node, Also he is very good in creating more innovative stuff on react native, I strongly recommend rakshit for any kind of innovative and high priority product and application development as a ui developer
testimonials.user: Muddu Raju, Working in EY as Technical Lead
